text: 6:14 Hagai 1:1; Sekaraia 1:1Kamaghɨn amizɨ, Judan gumazir dapaniba ingangarim bar deraghavɨra a gamua ghuavɨra iti. Ezɨ Godɨn akam inigha izir gumazimning Hagai, ko Idon ovavir borim Sekaraia, aning gavgavim me ganɨga me abɨri. Ezɨ Israelian God mɨkemezɨ moghɨn, me ingaravɨra ikia ghua anegɨfa. Egha Persian atriviba Sairus ko Darius ko Atrivim Artaserksis, me bar mɨkemezɨ moghɨra, Judaba Godɨn Dɨpenimɨn ingari.
